data.title: SECRET AGENT 23 SKIDOO
data.text:
artist bio:

– Secret Agent 23 Skidoo or is a Grammy Award-winning hip-hop musician from Asheville, North Carolina.

– Skidoo has been performing and recording Hip Hop children’s music since 2008.

– 2017 Grammy Award Winner for Best Children’s Recording for “Infinity Plus One”

– 2014 Grammy Award Nominee for Best Children’s Recording for “The Perfect Quirk”

– 2020 Grand Prize Winner of the John Lennon International Songwriting Competition for “Imaginary Friend”

– Skidoo has an ongoing streak of thirteen #1 hits on SiriusXM satellite radio, as well as music videos in rotation on NBC’s “Sprout House” and at Chuck E. Cheese restaurants nationwide.

– Skidoo tours extensively both nationally and internationally, having headlined family festivals in India, Canada, Australia, as well as performing at Lollapalooza, Austin City Limits, and the Smithsonian.

– Skidoo is a published author of three books for children and young adults, and has worked with the US Library Systems Official Summer Reading Program promoting literacy nationwide.

– Skidoo has taught rhyme writing workshops and residencies from America to Australia, and has released both an Audible Exclusive audiobook for young adults on the art of rhyme writing and a robust elementary grade curriculum.

– Skidoo has created exclusive singles, albums, and audiobook and podcast content for clients including Facebook (Meta), Amazon, Audible, Yoto, and Tinkercast.
